data.name: Hell Road VR - Deluxe Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains content:
  • Gorgeous gold 9mm pistol.
  • Flare gun at checkpoint in the first level.
  • Bonus "Cursed Church" arena level.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC contains content:
  • Gorgeous gold 9mm pistol.
  • Flare gun at checkpoint in the first level.
  • Bonus "Cursed Church" arena level.
data.short_description: This DLC contains content: - Gorgeous gold 9mm pistol. - Flare gun at checkpoint in the first level. - Bonus "Cursed Church" arena level.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB / AMD RX Vega 56 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
